name: Blox Fruits Dating Simulator
description:
PLEASE NOTE: When playing the browser version, sprites load progressively, and may appear pixelated when first loaded. There's nothing I can do about this, it's simply for optimisation.

Bugs/complaints should be e-mailed to tortoise@hacari.com with clear instructions. Thank you for playing.

A Whole New Perspective - Blox Fruits Dating Simulator
Experience the world of Blox Fruits inside of a new lens, directed towards that of visual novels. With over 2,500 blocks of dialogue,  this one's a kicker.

We gathered the most prominent figures within Blox Fruits, and threw them into a game about hanging out and creating relationships. Now ain't that something?
Courtesy of Blox Fruits Wiki™ Inc, and several artists working on the sprites for the game.
